text: The men's 4 × 390 metres relay event at the 1969 European Indoor Games was held on 8 March in Belgrade. Each athlete ran two laps of the 195 metres track. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Jan Werner Jan Radomski Andrzej Badeński Jan Balachowski || 3:01.9 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Leonid Mikishev Aleksandr Bratchikov Valeriy Borzov Yuriy Zorin || 3:01.9 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Dieter Hübner Herbert Moser Peter Bernreuther Manfred Kinder || 3:04.5 || |- | 4 ||align=left| ||align=left|Luciano Sušanj Istvan Danko Miro Kocuvan Stjepan Kremer || 3:09.1 || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1969 European Indoor Games – Men's 4 × 390 metres relay
